mapper.select: select max(org_no) from sys_org where parent_no = #{parentNo}
mapper.sql:
select o.org_no, o.org_name, o.parent_no, o.org_type, o.status, o.sort, o.create_time, o.create_user_id, so.org_name parent_name from sys_org o left join sys_org so on o.parent_no = so.org_no where 1=1
and o.org_name like '%${orgName}%'
and o.org_type = #{orgType}
and so.org_name like '%${parentName}%'
